CustomField.formula: IF(Prt_Sts_Amer__c = 'Stock_Out' && Demand_By_Americas__c > 0, 'Stock_Out', IF( Part_Number__r.Min_Stock_Americas__c == 0, 'Grey', IF((Prt_Sts_Amer__c = 'At_Risk' && Demand_By_Americas__c > 0) || (Prt_Sts_Amer__c = 'At_Risk' && Demand_By_Americas__c = 0 && Part_Number__r.Stock_By_Americas__c = 0)|| (Prt_Sts_Amer__c = 'Stock_Out' && Demand_By_Americas__c = 0) , 'At_Risk', 'Safe')) )
CustomField.label: Part_Platform_Status_AMERICAS
